thread.title: Family time in London
thread.title_full: Family time in London - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: acorvette4me
title: Family time in London
text: Apex offers a truly exeptional value anf quality of service stay. Highly recommended. There was small issue with our first room that was handled with a change of room and complimentary upgrade. The management and staff couldn't have been more attentive! Kudos to the leadership team for instilling a customer only mentality top to bottom
